meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Ogden Mallory Howe Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6828.

td.p: John Ogden, a communications executive from Silver Spring, Maryland
Mallory Howe, an eighth grade history teacher from Brea, California
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 7-day cash winnings total $144,910)

tr.td: LET'S SPEAK CANADIAN
(Alex: Eh?)
BETWEEN
DAD TV
(Alex: We want you to name the show, of course.)
HOW THEY DIED
FROM "C" TO SHINING "C"
(Alex: Each correct response begins and ends with the letter "C".)
THE ART OF NORMAN ROCKWELL

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Julia
Mallory
John
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: This is one of those "duh" Finals. You got to get this one, right?)
[John laughs.]
...
(Alex: [To Mallory] Even though you misspelled it.)
(Mallory: Spelled it wrong. I know. [Laughs])
(Alex: Just a little. You forgot an "E", but that\'s okay.)
...
(Alex: [To Julia] Oh, a little risky.)
MalloryWhat is Led Zepplin?
$7,000
JohnWhat is Led Zeppelin?
$7,201
JuliaWhat is Led Zeppelin?
$4,500
Led Zeppelin')

Mallory
John

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
